alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 23 at 12:03PM MDT until May 24 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Trail Creek at Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Trail Creek Ketchum 7.0 6.7 Tue 11 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-242200- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0006.000000T0000Z-230524T2200Z/ /TCKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1203 PM MDT Tue May 23 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT AND WETTING RAIN NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Trail Creek at Ketchum. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Near bankfull from near Corral Creek and Trail Creek to the confluence of the Big Wood River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
